bibl.author: John M. Rogers

revisionDesc.change: made basic checking changes to file

body.p:
As I have just came acrostacross one of your letter I thought I would write you a few Lines just to let you know that I have not for gotingforgotten you. I am enjoying good health as well as my Family. CinceSince I last saw you I was Married I have bee Married two years to day I have got
a little boy ten months old on the 18 of this month and I named him after you so you see I have not for gotingforgotten you How is the times in Washington it has been hard times here but I have got through the winter allrightalright. We have had very cold weather here it has been the coldest winter I ever experanceexperience. Work is very dull here now I am not doing much at preasantpresent how do you get alonalong out there. I have been away from Brooklyn Two Years next fowlfall I was throwedthrown out of work in New York with
about two Hundred others ten days before the panispains from the American Bank, Note, CoCompany and did not do any thing till January 20th I came to New Britain ConnConnecticut and I have been here cincesince I do not like it here I had rather be in the City some where how is BuisnessBusiness there if you come on this way I should like to have you come and see me if you can not stay more than one day but I would like to have you make me a good visit I have got a fine boy I can tell you he is as pretypretty as a picture we all send
Love I hope you will forgive me for not writing before this
